note:
Hobbies! I have some and will probably pick up more soon enough.
Gaming (MMO, city builder, puzzle, life sim, TTRPG), knitting/crochet (mostly sock knitting, but I'm on an afghan kick at the moment), reading (sci-fi, fantasy, historical romance), sewing (one day I shall teach myself to quilt, but not today) and cats.

fields.name: Cats
fields.value: Zorya (black F), Zuzu (tabby M), Tippy (Mom's calico F)
